animals.name: turtle
animals.description: Can't run, but sure can hide. This animal is very slow

animals.name: ant
animals.description: There are many different species of this insect around the world. They can be brown, red and black. They live in soil and cavities in wood and plants

animals.name: cow
animals.description: Its stomach contains four separate compartments. Their flautulence is responsible for a lot of the greenhouse gases. Their milk is very popular among human populations

animals.name: crocodile
animals.description: It eats fish, turtle and mammals. Lives solitarily in murky, warm and quiet waters. This reptile was around in times of the dinousaurs

animals.name: eagle
animals.description: There are many different species of this animal, almost everywhere in the world, often omnivore

animals.name: pig
animals.description: Loves belly scratches. It's one of the smartest animals on Earth, equivalent to a 3 year old child

animals.name: flea
animals.description: there used to be circuses where they acted, cats and dogs are like 24/7 buses for these tiny tiny creatures
